subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|亡|心|ls=psc|ls2=ic|t1=to lose, disappear, flee|c1=p|c2=s|t2=heart}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ma||not}}. Originally the same word as {{och-l|亡|to lose, disappear, flee}} as suggested by {{w|Shijing}} rimes, but it was later suffixed with a perfective suffix ''*-s'' (or ''*-h''), literally "it has disappeared (from mind)" ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
